title: Software Development Problems Guide
description: Comprehensive collection of 50 most common problems faced by software developers with detailed descriptions and categories

code_quality_issues.title: Code Quality Issues
code_quality_issues.description: Problems related to code quality, maintainability, and technical debt

problems.problem: Bugs and errors in the code

problems.impact: Reduced functionality, user frustration, increased support costs
problems.mitigation: Code review, testing, debugging tools, error handling

problems.problem: Complex and unmaintainable code

problems.problem: Technical debt from previous development efforts
